comments:
build I20060131

- deleted the closed project org.eclipse.ui.tools.heapstatus from my workspace
- it appeared to work OK
- noticed the following in the log
- not sure if it's a problem in ResourceChangeDescriptionFactory.delete or in DeleteResourceAction.validateDelete

!SUBENTRY 1 org.eclipse.core.resources 4 372 2006-02-06 14:31:00.102
!MESSAGE Resource /org.eclipse.ui.tools.heapstatus is not open.

This is a bug in the resource change description factory

Created an attachment (id=34219)

Updated patch.  There were similar problems with #create and #move
